mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_address ( user_id, full_address, recipient_name, phone, is_default, create_time, update_time ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{fullAddress}, #{recipientName}, #{phone}, #{isDefault}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime} )
mapper.update: UPDATE user_address SET is_default = 0 WHERE user_id = #{userId}
UPDATE user_address SET is_default = 1 WHERE address_id = #{addressId}
mapper.select: SELECT address_id, user_id, full_address, recipient_name, phone, is_default, create_time, update_time FROM user_address WHERE user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY is_default DESC, update_time DESC
SELECT address_id, user_id, full_address, recipient_name, phone, is_default, create_time, update_time FROM user_address WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND is_default = 1
SELECT address_id, user_id, full_address, recipient_name, phone, is_default, create_time, update_time FROM user_address WHERE address_id = #{addressId}
SELECT address_id, user_id, full_address, recipient_name, phone, is_default, create_time, update_time FROM user_address WHERE address_id = #{addressId} AND user_id = #{userId}
